texture.description: Path to the ORM texture relative to the textures directory, or "$DEFAULT_ORM". Must be an RGB texture encoded in BC7_UNORM. Occlusion is stored in the red channel, Roughness in green, and Metalness in blue.

occlusion_strength.description: Occlusion strength multiplier. Modulates the red channel by `saturate(1.0-(1.0-r)*strength)`

roughness_strength.description: Roughness strength multiplier. Modulates the green channel by `saturate(g*strength)`

metalness_strength.description: Metalness strength multiplier. Modulates the blue channel by `saturate(b*strength)`
